game.name: TS Marketplace: Bozeman Pass Scenario Pack 01
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Take the throttle and lug Northern Pacific and successor Burlington Northern freight tonnage over historic Bozeman Pass and across the “Big Sky Country” of Montana – with Bozeman Pass Scenario Pack 01 from High Iron Simulations!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Take the throttle and lug Northern Pacific and successor Burlington Northern freight tonnage over historic Bozeman Pass and across the “Big Sky Country” of Montana – with Bozeman Pass Scenario Pack 01 from High Iron Simulations!
